name: County Connection: LINK Paratransit
description: Door-to-door transit in Central Contra Costa County
fullDescription: LINK is County Connection's ADA paratransit service for Central Contra Costa County residents who cannot use regular bus service due to a disability.
whatTheyOffer:
- Door-to-door shared ride service
- Service in Central Contra Costa County
- Same-day and advance reservations
- Wheelchair accessible vehicles
- Personal care attendants ride free
howToGetIt:
1. Complete the LINK paratransit application
2. Application at countyconnection.com/paratransit
3. In-person assessment may be required
4. Once certified, schedule rides by phone
